    level="1"
    right="Feat 17"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Rampaging Ferocity](/Feats.aspx?ID=1294) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Orc" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=124" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 19 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Orc Ferocity](/Feats.aspx?ID=83)

**Trigger**
You use [Orc Ferocity](/Feats.aspx?ID=83)

</column>

---

You lash out viciously even as you fend off death. Make a single melee Strike. If this Strike brings a foe to 0 Hit Points, this activation of Orc Ferocity doesn't count against its frequency.
